Punishment is Justice

Sisters of Virgin Mary Kansas is a nunnery filled with ordinary highly religious nuns. However, when the priest is murdered, everything comes crashing down. A relationship is torn apart after abuse from a father. You thought the church was safe, but think again. What secrets are those statues hiding? There are many court cases but what really is the verdict? Remember God is always watching you...
